snippet: A palatial duplex at 720 Park Avenue, a neo-Georgian building designed by Rosario Candela in the late 1920s, is about to enter the market.
abstract: Mark Magowan, president of art book publisher Vendome Press, is listing his family's six-bedroom duplex in Rosario Candela-designed neo-Georgian building at 720 Park Avenue for $22.5 million.
lead_paragraph: A palatial duplex at 720 Park Avenue, a neo-Georgian building designed by Rosario Candela in the late 1920s, is about to enter the market.

headline.main: A Park Avenue Duplex for $22.5 Million
